name: @chialab/synapse
description: Application framework built on the top of DNA Web Components.

scripts.build: yarn types && rimraf dist && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:node
scripts.build:esm: rimraf dist/esm && rna build src/index.ts --output dist/esm/synapse.js --format esm --minify --jsxFactory h --jsxFragment Fragment --jsxModule '@chialab/dna' --platform browser
scripts.build:node: rimraf dist/node && rna build src/index.ts --output dist/node/synapse.js --format esm --minify --jsxFactory h --jsxFragment Fragment --jsxModule '@chialab/dna' --platform node
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && rna build src/index.ts --output dist/cjs/synapse.cjs --format cjs --minify --platform node

author: Chialab <dev@chialab.io> (https://www.chialab.it)
